title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.13 - Protection of individuals during operations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.13 - Protection of individuals during operations

State Regulations

Operations at the land disposal facility must be
conducted in compliance with the standards for radiation protection set out in

Title 12, Part 38, of the Codes, Rules and Regulations of the State of New

York,except for radiation doses governed by section
382.11
of this Part. Radiation
exposures must be maintained as low as reasonably achievable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
382.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
